actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to establish and expand child opportunity zone family centers in public elementary schools and secondary schools, and for there purposes.
short_title: Child Opportunity Zone Family Center Act of 2001
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Child Opportunity Zone Family Center Act of 2001 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide for Child Opportunity Zone Family Centers (school-based or school-linked community service centers that provide and link children and their families with comprehensive information, support, services, and activities to improve the children's and families' education, health, mental health, safety, and economic well-being).Authorizes the Secretary of Education to award competitive grants to eligible partnerships for the Federal share of costs of establishing and expanding such centers.

titles.title: Child Opportunity Zone Family Center Act of 2001
A bill to establish and expand child opportunity zone family centers in public elementary schools and secondary schools, and for there purposes.
